page.title: 16 FOOD & POCKET MONEY
page.content:
---FOOD---
The most poular food in Class Five was roast dinner.Then it was fish and chips And the least was liver and steak and kidney pie.The most popular drink was coke,four people chose that.The least popular drink was lager.
--- POCKET MONEY ---
The largest amount of pocket money was six pounds.The least was twenty pence. The average was one pound thirty four, but most people got one pound or less. Most people spent their money on sweets and comics. Only a few people saved their money.
